name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. HAZLETON NATIONAL BANK OF HAZLETON, Pennsylvania, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. HAZLETON NATIONAL BANK OF HAZLETON, Pennsylvania, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed 10 Pa.Cmwlth. 366, 308 A.2d 195.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Alphonsus R. Romeika, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Israel Packel, Atty. Gen., Edward T. Baker, Deputy Atty. Gen., Eugene J. Anastasio, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
333 A.2d 871
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. HAZLETON NATIONAL BANK OF HAZLETON, Pennsylvania, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 11, 1974.
Decided March 18, 1975.
Alphonsus R. Romeika, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Israel Packel, Atty. Gen., Edward T. Baker, Deputy Atty. Gen., Eugene J. Anastasio, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
